subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Mike Krzyzewski, who already had the mark for wins by an N.C.A.A. Division I men’s coach, reached a milestone as the freshman Jahlil Okafor helped the Blue Devils rally against St. John’s.
snippet: Mike Krzyzewski, who already had the mark for wins by an N.C.A.A. Division I men’s coach, reached a milestone as the freshman Jahlil Okafor helped the Blue Devils rally against St. John’s.
